update P_INVOICE_APPLY
INVOICE_COMPANY = #{invoiceCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVOICE_DATE = #{invoiceDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVOICE_NUMBER = #{invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVOICE_CODE = #{invoiceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVOICE_ITEM = #{invoiceItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIT_PRICE = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NUMBER_SL = #{numberSl,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUM_AMT = #{sumAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TAX = #{tax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXPRESS_COMPANY = #{expressCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPRESS_NUMBER = #{expressNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPRESS_DATE = #{expressDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPRESS_REMARK = #{expressRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YS_DATE = #{ysDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ES_DATE = #{esDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YS_RESULT = #{ysResult,jdbcType=CHAR},
RETURN_REASON = #{returnReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RETURN_DATE = #{returnDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RETURN_EXPRESS_NUMBER = #{returnExpressNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RETURN_EXPRESS_COMPANY = #{returnExpressCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_NAME = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVOICE_AMT_MONTH = #{invoiceAmtMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ES_RESULT = #{esResult,jdbcType=CHAR},
AMOUNT_TAX = #{amountTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR},
SERIAL_NO = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXPENSE_STATUS = #{expenseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVOICE_TYPE = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

IMPORT_BATCH = #{importBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BATCH_NO = #{batchNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

CW_IMPORT = #{cwImport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update P_INVOICE_APPLY set INVOICE_COMPANY = #{invoiceCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_DATE = #{invoiceDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_NUMBER = #{invoiceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_CODE = #{invoiceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_ITEM = #{invoiceItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_PRICE = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NUMBER_SL = #{numberSl,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUM_AMT = #{sumAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TAX = #{tax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXPRESS_COMPANY = #{expressCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPRESS_NUMBER = #{expressNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPRESS_DATE = #{expressDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXPRESS_REMARK = #{expressRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YS_DATE = #{ysDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ES_DATE = #{esDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YS_RESULT = #{ysResult,jdbcType=CHAR}, RETURN_REASON = #{returnReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RETURN_DATE = #{returnDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RETURN_EXPRESS_NUMBER = #{returnExpressNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RETURN_EXPRESS_COMPANY = #{returnExpressCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_NAME = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_NAME = #{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_AMT_MONTH = #{invoiceAmtMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ES_RESULT = #{esResult,jdbcType=CHAR}, AMOUNT_TAX = #{amountTax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, SERIAL_NO = #{serialNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EXPENSE_STATUS = #{expenseStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_TYPE = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALLER_NAME = #{sallerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALLER_NO = #{sallerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROFIT_MONTH = #{profitMonth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REV1 = #{rev1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REV2 = #{rev2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REV3 = #{rev3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REV4 = #{rev4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAILING_STATUS = #{mailingStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMPORT_BATCH = #{importBatch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BATCH_NO = #{batchNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGENT_IMPORT = #{agentImport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CW_IMPORT = #{cwImport,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

sql.if: select * from ( select row_.*, rownum rownum_ from (

mapper.select: select CLO_REALNAME from A_agent_colinfo where AGENT_ID= #{id}
select OWN_INVOICE from P_INVOICE_SUM where PROFIT_MONTH = #{month} and AGENT_ID = #{agentId} and INVOICE_COMPANY = #{invoiceCompany}
select CLO_TAX_POINT from A_AGENT_COLINFO where STATUS = 1 and AGENT_ID = #{agentId}
select max(IMPORT_BATCH) from P_INVOICE_APPLY where substr(IMPORT_BATCH,0,8) = #{dateStr}
select AGENT_ID,AGENT_NAME from P_INVOICE_SUM where INVOICE_COMPANY = #{invoiceCompany} and PROFIT_MONTH = #{month}
select distinct pa.CW_IMPORT,cu.NAME,cu.LOGIN_NAME from P_INVOICE_APPLY pa inner join C_USER cu on pa.CW_IMPORT = cu.ID
mapper.sql: pa.ID, pa.INVOICE_COMPANY, pa.INVOICE_DATE, pa.INVOICE_NUMBER, pa.INVOICE_CODE, pa.INVOICE_ITEM, pa.UNIT_PRICE, pa.NUMBER_SL, pa.SUM_AMT, pa.TAX, pa.EXPRESS_COMPANY, pa.EXPRESS_NUMBER, pa.EXPRESS_DATE, pa.EXPRESS_REMARK, pa.YS_DATE, pa.ES_DATE, pa.YS_RESULT, pa.RETURN_REASON, pa.RETURN_DATE, pa.RETURN_EXPRESS_NUMBER, pa.RETURN_EXPRESS_COMPANY, pa.CREATE_DATE, pa.CREATE_NAME, pa.AGENT_ID, pa.AGENT_NAME, pa.INVOICE_AMT_MONTH, pa.ES_RESULT, pa.AMOUNT_TAX, pa.STATUS, pa.SERIAL_NO, pa.AMOUNT, pa.EXPENSE_STATUS, pa.INVOICE_TYPE, pa.SALLER_NAME, pa.SALLER_NO, pa.REMARK, pa.PROFIT_MONTH, pa.REV1, pa.REV2, pa.REV3, pa.REV4, pa.MAILING_STATUS, pa.IMPORT_BATCH, pa.BATCH_NO, pa.AGENT_IMPORT, pa.CW_IMPORT,cu.NAME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from P_INVOICE_APPLY pa left join C_USER cu on pa.CW_IMPORT = cu.ID
order by ${orderByClause}
select count(*) from P_INVOICE_APPLY pa left join C_USER cu on pa.CW_IMPORT = cu.ID

select
distinct
pa.INVOICE_COMPANY INVOICECOMPANY, pa.INVOICE_DATE INVOICEDATE, pa.INVOICE_NUMBER INVOICENUMBER, pa.INVOICE_CODE INVOICECODE, pa.INVOICE_ITEM INVOICEITEM, pa.SUM_AMT SUMAMT, pa.TAX, pa.EXPRESS_COMPANY EXPRESSCOMPANY, pa.EXPRESS_NUMBER EXPRESSNUMBER, pa.EXPRESS_DATE EXPRESSDATE, pa.EXPRESS_REMARK EXPRESSREMARK, pa.YS_DATE YSDATE, pa.ES_DATE ESDATE, pa.CREATE_DATE CREATEDATE, pa.AGENT_ID AGENTID, pa.AGENT_NAME AGENTNAME, pa.AMOUNT_TAX AMOUNTTAX, pa.STATUS, pa.SERIAL_NO, pa.AMOUNT, pa.EXPENSE_STATUS, pa.SALLER_NAME, pa.SALLER_NO, pa.REMARK, pa.REV1, pa.REV2, pa.IMPORT_BATCH IMPORTBATCH, pa.BATCH_NO BATCHNO, pa.AGENT_IMPORT AGENTIMPORT, pa.CW_IMPORT CWIMPORT,cu.NAME, case when pa.YS_RESULT = '1' then '通过' when pa.YS_RESULT = '0' then '未通过' when pa.YS_RESULT = '2' then '未进行初审' else '未审核' end as YSRESULT, case when pa.ES_RESULT = '1' then '通过' when pa.ES_RESULT = '0' then '未通过' else '未审核' end as ESRESULT, case when pa.INVOICE_TYPE = '1' then '普通电子发票' when pa.INVOICE_TYPE = '2' then '电子发票专票' when pa.INVOICE_TYPE = '3' then '普通纸质发票' when pa.INVOICE_TYPE = '4' then '专用纸质发票' when pa.INVOICE_TYPE = '5' then '普通纸质卷票' when pa.INVOICE_TYPE = '7' then '通用机打' when pa.INVOICE_TYPE = '8' then '的士票' when pa.INVOICE_TYPE = '9' then '火车票' when pa.INVOICE_TYPE = '10' then '飞机票' when pa.INVOICE_TYPE = '11' then '其他' when pa.INVOICE_TYPE = '12' then '机动车' when pa.INVOICE_TYPE = '13' then '二手车' when pa.INVOICE_TYPE = '14' then '定额发票' when pa.INVOICE_TYPE = '15' then '通行费' else pa.INVOICE_TYPE end as INVOICETYPE
from P_INVOICE_APPLY pa left join C_USER cu on pa.CW_IMPORT = cu.ID
order by ${orderByClause}
